title: what font is the text \>\>Siruthuli
author: itsnav

comments.content: It looks like an **[Albertus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124811/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Agfa&ffam=Albertus%20Medium%20-%20Regular&fid=983ef59a0bcb5c4c963598b58edf375c&fsize=60&text=Siruthuli&fit=1)** with modified /i & /t
you're right. the 't' is from AlbrechtSSK. and 'i' is the same. dot removed
